sentences.en: And so his sacking yesterday was undoubtedly a blow to the mission.
sentences.cn: 所以,他上周四被解职,无疑是对驻阿使命的打击.

sentences.en: Companies might hesitate before sacking an IT adviser.
sentences.cn: 企业要解雇IT顾问的话会犹豫再三.

sentences.en: Did the BBC act reasonably in sacking the journalist?
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司开除该记者做得合理 吗 ?

sentences.en: Employers are free to cut back costs by squeezing pay rather than by sacking marginal workers.
sentences.cn: 雇主可以自由消减成本,压缩工资,而不是解雇边缘劳工.

sentences.en: He drew his rifle from its sacking cover.
sentences.cn: 他从麻布枪套里抽出步枪.

sentences.en: He incurred the odium of everyone by sacking the old caretaker.
sentences.cn: 他因解雇老管理员而激起公愤.

sentences.en: I'll stuff the hole with a bit of sacking before we go.
sentences.cn: 走以前,我拿布把老鼠洞堵上.

sentences.en: Lately, the president has been sacking and picking new ministers at whim.
sentences.cn: 最近，总统一时兴起频频解雇旧部长，选任新部长。

sentences.en: The men on the sacking platform had used up all the sacks.
sentences.cn: 打包台上的人把袋子都用光了.

sentences.en: The three dimensional ceramic body is made by sacking layers of printing ceramic ink.
sentences.cn: 它是在计算机控制下多层打印逐层叠加制出三维陶瓷坯体.

sentences.en: Then there would be an inquiry, the sacking of my room.
sentences.cn: 他们一定要调查, 要来搜索我的房间.

trans.tran_cn: 口袋布，制袋子用的粗麻布，帆布（等于sackcloth），厚纸袋，塑料袋
trans.tran_en: Sacking is rough woven material that is used to make sacks

trans.tran_cn: 解雇(sack的ing形式)，装进，获得，把…装入袋子
